name: Eons Passed
description:
Eons has passed, robot woke up and search to recharge it self and find the exit, is it enough? is another eons need to pass to to complete his journey? Is he truly alone in there, another there more robots waiting to awake in another eons? Time will tell.

Press AWSD to move, E to interact

Music: Simplex by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4367-simplex
